content:
Formatting Enum

Definition

Specifies formatting options for the XmlTextWriter.

In this Article

public enum Formatting
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
Formatting

Fields

Indented

Causes child elements to be indented according to the stem.Xml.XmlTextWriter.Indentation* and stem.Xml.XmlTextWriter.IndentChar* settings.
None

No special formatting is applied. This is the default.
